content.title: ANCA-Associated Vasculitis
content.description: Small vessel vasculitides associated with antineutrophil cytoplasmic antibodies

key_concepts.details: GPA (Wegener's), MPA, EGPA (Churg-Strauss) constitute the main ANCA-associated vasculitides
PR3-ANCA associated with GPA; MPO-ANCA associated with MPA and EGPA
Small vessel disease; renal (glomerulonephritis), pulmonary, peripheral nerve involvement
Rituximab or cyclophosphamide induction; maintenance with rituximab or azathioprine

content.clinical_significance: ANCA testing is essential for diagnosis and prognosis

primary_sources: Kitching AR et al. Nat Rev Dis Primers 2020
